title: Confront the Elder Brain
content:
nd free Prince Orpheus. Arabella: Save Arabella in Act 1, then find her parents in Act 2, and let her take Wither's advice. In Act 3, find her in city sewers. Nine-Fingers; Help her in the quest Aid the Underduke. The Gondians: Save the Gondians from Iron Throne and disabled the steel watchers.
